pull.title: Clarify CreateTransaction error messages
pull.body: Logic change removing nValue check is fine since value won't be negative, and thus can give a better error.

comments.body:
Do you want to include this line too?
Not sure it's worth changing these, but if you are going to, perhaps you could be even more clear
"One of the transaction output amounts .." or similar
you're right not important, thought I changed it back
